title: Where can I get the complete syllabus of the UPSC exam? - Quora
tags: Union Public Service Commission of India

response.answer_text: No where . Go online . Ncert . Newspaper. News. University books. Be aware of news to national importance and international news that affects India and has effected human evolution from beginning till now. Try to observe changes and try to learn even a single change which happens near your Even a topper in UPSC secures 50–55 percent overall and they are great people who will lead INDIA to brighter future. How you even think of getting whole syllabus for of UPSC.

You can get syllabus on these website's which are given below: upsc.in on this you can get All relevant thing which will come in exam in current years.Unacademy - India's largest learning platform- here follow Roman sainy sir.
